description:
This match up is a replacement for the Hollie Stevens vs Adrianna Nicole Match up. An injury prevented Adrianna from participating, Holly moves forward to face Ariel X.
Welcome back Dragonlily from maternity leave! She will be back full time for Season 7.
We also welcome the athletic big breasted Holly Heart to Ultimate Surrender. Holly will also be a full time wrestler in season 7 and a sexy addition to the roster.
Holly came in blazing with strength and energy. However she was no match for the veteran. The Dragon introduced her properly to Ultimate Surrender with a hard ass fucking for losing. Welcome to US Holly!
title: Exhibition match up
